page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH MR.PARRY
page.content: One of the most interesting people in the village of{Picklescott}was {Mr.Parry}.He has lived in Picklescott all his life and he is now 72 years old. He used to walk to{Shrewsbury} regularly,there and back;a distance of twenty miles,round trip. His father used to be the village {undertaker}and he would make the coffins.His mother would do the job of lining the inside. He told us that if the old landlord of the village pub,"The Bottle And Glass" didn't like you he would stand on your leg and would not get off.
